# Introduction

This vignette provides an example workflow to calculate the Pacific Herring spawn index in British Columbia.
Start by loading the `SpawnIndex` package and specify the region and years of interest.

```{r setup}
# Load the library
library(SpawnIndex)
# Parameters
region <- "WCVI"      # Region of interest
yrRange <- 2010:2015  # Years to consider
```

In this example, we will focus on `r region` from `r min(yrRange)` to `r max(yrRange)`.
